item.title: E. Jean Carroll Recounts Her Trump Rape Allegations In ‘Hilarious’ New Book
item.description: E. Jean Carroll thoroughly captures the delusional, narcissistic, and devious nature of the anti-Trump left.

item.title: Ivy League Researchers Scaremonger About GOP Health Policy But Say Nothing About Similar Democrat Plans
item.description: When the GOP scales back entitlements, the professoriate says legions of people will die. But when Democrats do the same thing, they're silent.

item.title: L.A. Riots Are A Proxy War For The Ruling Class’s Fight Against Real America
item.description: The intifada in Los Angeles, Austin, Philadelphia, New York, Boston, and even Omaha is the sequel to the summer of George Floyd.

item.title: 80 Percent Of Anti-Trump Lawsuits Are Filed In Courts Ruled By Democrat Appointees

item.title: Financial Data Reveals ‘No Kings’ Protests Are Hypocritical Astroturfing
item.description: The left’s latest bid to regain power is a clunky combination of astroturfing and gaslighting.
